Terms of Use

Welcome to ToolStack. By using this site, you agree to the following terms. If you do not agree, kindly refrain from using the service.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using ToolStack, you acknowledge that you’ve read, understood, and agreed to be bound by these Terms of Use.

2. No Warranty

All tools and services provided on ToolStack are offered "as-is" without warranties of any kind. While we strive for accuracy, we make no guarantees regarding correctness, uptime, or output validity.

3. Limitation of Liability

Under no circumstances shall ToolStack or its developer be liable for any damages arising out of or related to your use or inability to use the site — including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

4. Proper Use

You agree to use ToolStack legally, ethically, and responsibly. Misuse of the service for malicious purposes is strictly prohibited and may result in denial of access.

5. Ownership & Usage Rights

The code, branding, and content on ToolStack are the intellectual property of the developer unless stated otherwise. You may not replicate or redistribute the service without permission.

6. Future Changes

These Terms may evolve as ToolStack grows. We’ll aim to keep you informed, but it’s your responsibility to review the latest version occasionally.

If you have questions or need clarification, contact the developer.
